definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: We are busy preparing the land for sowing.
sentences.chinese: 我们忙于平整土地，准备播种。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a small corn seeder provided with a box-shaped baiting box;
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种小型化的玉米播种机。

sentences.english: Jesus' day, farmers didn't have tractors or planters.
sentences.chinese: 在耶稣的时代，农夫没有拖拉机和播种机。

sentences.english: First frost meant magic snowball time.
sentences.chinese: 早霜意味着是播种魔法雪球的时候。

sentences.english: She can sow, so I will sow instead of her tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她会缝纫，所以明天我代她去播种。

sentences.english: Teachers, the hard work you are the United States, the United States and the sower .
sentences.chinese: 老师，您的辛勤工作是美国，美国与播种者。

sentences.english: We can select the planting machine according to the different needs of users.
sentences.chinese: 还可以根据用户的不同需求，配置合适的播种器。

sentences.english: In the following spring, the seeds should be knocked out of the seed - heads and sown.
sentences.chinese: 到了第二年春天把种子从谷壳里打出来，然后播种。

sentences.english: After sows seeds three days the condition of the sprout hypha .
sentences.chinese: 播种三天后菌丝萌发状况。

sentences.english: In stimulate module test of no-tillage seeder, its transfer functions were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在播种机的模态激振测试中，估计了它的传递函数。
青春是生命中播种的季节。

sentences.english: China expects higher rice planting acre.
sentences.chinese: 中国计划增加早稻播种面积。

sentences.english: Objective To find the suitable seeding time of herba leonuri.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索益母草合适的播种期。

sentences.english: The sowing of one seedling-raising disk can be completed by operating the seeder once.
sentences.chinese: 每操作一次即可完成一个育苗盘的播种。

sentences.english: Alternate strips planted to crops each year serve as windbreaks for the fallow strip.
sentences.chinese: 每年播种作物的轮种带可用作休耕带的防风林。
青年时代是人生的播种期。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
